ygData.subject: Re: The meaning of proc
ygData.msgSnippet: YAY!! Well thank you finally!! Everyone had been so anxious about telling me this and that and it slipped (conveniently?) our minds to touch on that subject.
ygData.messageBody:
YAY!!
Well thank you finally!! Everyone had been so anxious about telling me this
and that and it slipped (conveniently?) our minds to touch on that subject.
It's useless triva knowledge, I know, but I've always been good for that
sort of thing while chatting away in groups between battles or even within
the guild. Thank you Galeras!!

Pava, Bard of Proc'ing
Silent Dragons
Cazic Thule

>Someone was asking earlier what proc means. It is an old MUD acronym.
>
>PROC=Perpetual Randomness Of Casting
>--
>Galeras
>Merchant and Bard of 8 Songs
>E'ci
>
